thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Paul Roman

author: Paul Roman
title: Paul Roman
text:
We have 2 units on different properties. I have recommended to people that have bought it and are very happy as well.
After a $ 130 k water disaster we bought our first one. It has save us 3 times that we know of in our retail clothing store. On our ranch we have it at the very first foot of service because the irrigation is so complex it has saved us thousands of dollars and because we are in a drought area saved our relationship with the water resources people.
